example_actions.name: Compile
example_actions.command: CRTSQLRPGI OBJ(${objlib|Object library|&OPENLIB|&OBJ_LIB}/${objname|Object Name|&OPENMBR}) SRCFILE(&OPENLIB/&OPENSPF) OBJTYPE(${objtype|Object Type|*SRVPGM,*PGM,*MODULE}) CLOSQLCSR(*ENDMOD) OPTION(*EVENTF) DBGVIEW(${dbgview|Debug View|*SOURCE,*NONE}) TGTRLS(*CURRENT)
